name: castopod
description: Castopod is a self-hosted podcast hosting platform built to support social interaction and sharing. It supports multiple users, analytics, episode scheduling, and federated distribution with ActivityPub.
features: Podcast Hosting: Complete platform for hosting and distributing podcasts. Professional solution.
ActivityPub Federation: Connect with the fediverse for social distribution. Decentralized reach.
Episode Scheduling: Plan and automate episode releases. Consistent publishing.
Analytics Dashboard: Track listener statistics and engagement. Understand your audience.
Multi-User: Team collaboration with role-based permissions. Shared management.
RSS Feeds: Standard podcast RSS for all directories. Universal compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Own your podcast platform and data. Complete independence.
